skills.skill: Modeling and Detailing with PTC Creo

duties_responsibilities.duty: Download 2D/3D CAD files from the customer Team Center for each received working package.
Create and/or modify engineering drawings in conformance with client standards and specifications as per the customer’s specified project requirements.
Ensure engineering change documentation conforms to Client standards and specifications.
Upload 2D/3D CAD files (models, drawings, and BNU) in the customer database.
Complete projects in a timely manner to meet customer due dates.
Communicate with the Project lead regularly on project status, Project queries or observations, delays, and issues encountered.
